issue.title: [CF 710] Script ran too long
issue.body:
Getting this error on Sha of Fear Heroic. Memory demand for TMW growing up to 40mb after this.

Date: 2012-11-26 00:27:39
Error occured in: Global
Message: ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua line 64:
   script ran too long
Debug:
   (tail call): ?
   ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:64:
      ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:54
   ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:83:
      ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:54
   ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:84:
      ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:54
   ...llMeWhen\Lib\AceSerializer-3.0\AceSerializer-3.0.lua:123: Serialize()
   ...ellMeWhen\Components\Core\Spells\ClassSpellCache.lua:215: ?()
   ...que\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147:
      ...que\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147
   [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:4:
      [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:4
   [C]: ?
   [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:13: ?()
   ...que\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:92: Fire()
   ...ce\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceComm-3.0\AceComm-3.0.lua:339:
      ...ce\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceComm-3.0\AceComm-3.0.lua:321

Message: [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"] line 13:
   script ran too long
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:13: ?()
   ...que\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:92: Fire()
   ...ce\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceComm-3.0\AceComm-3.0.lua:339:
      ...ce\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceComm-3.0\AceComm-3.0.lua:321

This should be fixed in r674
